name: AudioCodes Ltd.
description: AudioCodes Ltd. is a leading provider of advanced communications software, products, and productivity solutions for the digital workplace. Founded in 1993 and headquartered in Israel, AudioCodes specializes in Voice over IP (VoIP) technologies, offering a wide range of solutions for enterprises and service providers. The company’s portfolio includes session border controllers, media gateways, and IP phone systems that facilitate seamless communication over the internet. AudioCodes also focuses on enhancing productivity in the workplace with cloud-based solutions that integrate with Microsoft Teams and other collaboration platforms. By leveraging its innovative technologies, AudioCodes helps organizations improve their communication infrastructure, reduce costs, and enhance the overall user experience. The company is committed to providing high-quality audio and video communication solutions, ensuring customers can connect reliably and effectively. AudioCodes serves customers globally across various industries, including healthcare, education, and finance, allowing them to adapt to the evolving demands of modern communication.
